name: Azure Dragons

Neutral.Abilities:
:unit_attack: If you resolve a "-1" on the [Attack die](../dice.md#attack-die), the target gains :paralysis:.
:unit_passive: Ignore any [:spellpower:](../spells/index.md) effects and :damage: from [Specialty](../heroes/index.md).

notes: The effects of the player's own spells and specialties are also ignored.
Specialties are the hero-specific cards (Ⅰ, Ⅳ, and Ⅵ).
